issue.title: [CF 1526] Hard crash when pasting into text box
issue.body:
If I try to "ctrl v" into the text box in order to paste a profile into TMW the wow exe hard crashes and most of the time req a ctrl alt del - end process.


> Posted by CurseForge user Red5x5 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1526 | Raw

comments.body:
This was with no addons but TMW also


> Posted by CurseForge user Red5x5

Nothing I can do - Blizzard made this much worse in the patch. Post on the forums if you would like them to fix it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I see np just wanted to tell someone =)


> Posted by CurseForge user Red5x5
